Articles.Content: I claim the hill. I do nothing to get you off of it, but it is still mine. Nothing you can do will make me change my mind. That hill is mine because I believe it is mine. I am the king of the hill.
I use Deplanetizer to destroy planet with hill, Then i make new planet from derbis and make new hill in new planet. I will make hill great again!

I build a hill out of Gilly, with Hyperedit.

My Gilly sticking out of the ground.
I throw Donald Truck to Gilly, Them smashed Truck will make hill great again

MAGIC!

My hill. (On kerbin)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-18T16:23:49Z" title="05/18/2016 04:23  PM" data-short="8 yr">May 18, 2016</time> by icantmakemodels**

> My hill. (On kerbin)
> 

I flatten the hill and then use X-rays to place it on Kerbol.

I peacefully take the kerbol hill since you have since move on to other hills in the past month. [@Matuchkin](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/135127-matuchkin/) can you help me get this going again

**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-28T16:51:46Z" title="07/28/2016 04:51  PM" data-short="7 yr">July 28, 2016</time> by ThaZeus**

I look at [@ThaZeus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/148344-thazeus/), give him a friendly smile, and call everyone else to bomb the crap out of the kerbol hill that he is sitting on.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-28T21:23:55Z" title="07/28/2016 09:23  PM" data-short="7 yr">July 28, 2016</time> by Matuchkin**

I use a giant claw thing to grab the hill and put it on the moon Lamancha in the Cervantes system. No one else is on this moon, so I am the king of both Lamancha and this hill. 

Then I turn Kerbol into a red giant because reasons.

I invade the moon Lamancha in the Cervantes system with an army of a certain species of aliens that are known for their successes at claiming hills. It turns out an army is a bit overkill, seeing as how no one is on the moon Lamancha in the Cervantes system except for you. I claim the hill for my own, fire the hill stealing aliens and hire a different species of aliens who are universally known for their successes at defending hills, to defend my hill from all thieves.

I then take my hill and go home, leaving the moon Lamancha in the Cervantes system minus one hill.

I set up shop in the sol system giving out free hills. If you want a hill come and get it.

Free hills!

It's high noon....

Now they're all mine and my team has switched to salt-powered robots to defend.

![Fm4gDy0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Fm4gDy0.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-29T05:26:12Z" title="07/29/2016 05:26  AM" data-short="7 yr">July 29, 2016</time> by legoclone09**

Using a time machine, I go back in time before you claimed the hills and claim them all.

I then create a temporal shield so that the hills stay forever in this point in time and exist nowhere else. The shield also protects from all forms of assault.
I take a shovel and make myself my own hill. Then I let Mei build four meter high ice walls around my hill.

But Mei can only have one at a time. And they last for a few seconds.

*ELIMINATED MEI* (fire) *100*

\*takes point\*

Ryuu ga waga teki wo kurau! The dragon destroys my enemies!

\*takes point back\*

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6wxoggz6AkE](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6wxoggz6AkE)\*

Fixed it for you!

Now for mine:

![gRPRvq5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/gRPRvq5.jpg)

I defend my hill with my pyro who melt that ice, and bring back your rockets

**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-30T00:42:22Z" title="07/30/2016 12:42  AM" data-short="7 yr">July 30, 2016</time> by TedwinKnockman66**

That pyro is a spy!

\*soldier kills\*

\*caps point\*

Blu wins. My ~~map~~ hill.

I de-orbit the MEKA (D.Va's mech) that I had sitting in orbit so it lands right on top of [@legoclone09](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/142607-legoclone09/)'s hill. Before the MEKA impacts into the hill, I overload its Fusion reactor, causing it to explode and kill [@legoclone09](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/142607-legoclone09/) and whatever he had on his hill. 

After taking the hill, I launch another MEKA into orbit and set up a defense system consisting of salt-powered robots and a trench full of crocodiles. Have fun taking my hill!

I smash your tiny mech with summoner mech and make hill great again!

![summondariyon.jpg](http://www.crayven.net/warhawk/mechbay/summondariyon.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-04T19:00:45Z" title="08/04/2016 07:00  PM" data-short="7 yr">August 4, 2016</time> by TedwinKnockman66**

I destroy the mech with *SCIENCE!* and then wall it off.

![zWdSL3o.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/zWdSL3o.jpg)

I make science more correct and wreck wall with ![mythbusters.0.0.jpg](https://cdn3.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/dKtOI_5-2XfL10feqZok7gnUOqg=/38x0:569x299/1280x720/cdn0.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_image/image/47484267/mythbusters.0.0.jpg)

![mythbusters-canceled__oPt.jpg](http://i.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/mythbusters-canceled__oPt.jpg)

And it was cancelled!

> 
> 
> 9 minutes ago, legoclone09 said:
> 
> 
> ![mythbusters-canceled__oPt.jpg](http://i.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/mythbusters-canceled__oPt.jpg)
> 
> 
> 
> And it was cancelled!
> 

No it wasn't.... they had just done it all... they ended it on their terms....  

I seek legal redress, in the Galactic Court... I seek ownership of all hills past, present and future, in all dimensions, realities and all Galaxies..... I proclaim myself King of the Hill past, present and future... and if anyone wants to argue about that... then my lawyers will take you to the cleaners.
